Whether you're looking to capture stunning portraits or breathtaking scenery, this device has you covered. The 2MP selfie camera lets you capture selfies.


Forget about the Charger with the Large 5100mAh Battery

The Galaxy Tab A7 Lite carries more power than you'd expect in a device this sleek. It is powered by a 5,100mAh battery that gives you the freedom to forget about the charger for long periods when you have somewhere to go or lots to watch. It supports 15 watts of fast charging and saves you time.

full_description:
Samsung Galaxy Tab S8+ Wi-Fi 12.4" Tablet

The Samsung Galaxy Tab S8+ Wi-Fi12.4" Tablet is a state-of-the-art gadget that pushes the limits of tablet computing. With a resolution of 1752 x 2800 pixels and a 16:10 aspect ratio, this gorgeous 12.4-inch Super AMOLED display will captivate you with its striking graphics that feature deep blacks, rich colors, and clear details at an astounding density of almost 249 pixels per inch. Every picture and video is presented with remarkable clarity and realism thanks to the display's buttery-smooth 120Hz refresh rate and HDR10+ compatibility, making for an immersive viewing experience unlike any other. With CPU rates of up to 2.99GHz, 2.4GHz, and 1.7GHz, the Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 Plus octa-core engine powers smooth performance and responsiveness for even the most demanding users. You'll have plenty of room to save your applications, games, pictures, movies, and more with 128GB of internal storage that can be expanded with a microSD card and 8GB of RAM, all while enjoying blazing-fast multitasking. Throughout the day, stay connected and productive with the Li-Po 10090mAh battery, which offers continuous use and long-lasting power. Additionally, your smartphone supports 45W wired charging, so you can rapidly recharge it and get back to what really important. The Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 Plus Wi-Fi12.4" Tablet raises the bar for tablet technology with its superior experience that enhances all facets of your digital life, whether you're working, playing games, streaming, or creating.

Super AMOLED Display

Samsung Galaxy Tab S8+ Tablet comes with Super AMOLED display which combines touch sensors and the screen itself into a single layer. In comparison to other display technologies like LCD, an AMOLED display uses less electricity, produces sharper pictures, and responds to motion faster than a standard LCD display.

Be the Center of Attention Wherever You Are

With Samsung Galaxy Tab S8+ Tablet remarkable field of vision, the Dual Front Camera (Ultra Wide + Wide) offers the best conditions for 4K video shooting. With auto framing, the speaker receives the attention they merit. Thus, when you film a dancing class, the camera will automatically focus on you and your movements while you impart knowledge. The focus is still on video calls. full_description:
Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Lite 4GB RAM 64GB ROM 8.7-inch Android Tablet

The Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Lite features an 8.7" display, an 80% Screen-to-Body ratio, and a Slim Metal Body. It is powered by a Mediatek MT8768T octa-core Processor for best-in-class performance. It combines an octa-core Arm-Cortex A53 MPCoreTM CPU with an Arm NEON engine operating up to 2.3GHz with a powerful IMG PowerVR GE8320-class graphics processor. It comes with 4GB RAM for easy multi-tasking. You can use several applications at the same time without any hassle. The Galaxy Tab A7 Lite comes with 64GB storage built-in for all your hi-resolution videos, photos, and files. You can then expand it with a microSD card for even more storage up to 1TB.

Gesture-based Menu for One-handed Use

The Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Lite comes with a gesture-based menu that allows you to do things like go Back, see your Recent Apps, and return to the Home menu, all with a swipe of your thumb.


Capture and Share Your Moment with the 8MP Camera

The Tablet is equipped with an 8MP main camera that keeps your memories vivid, bright, and clear. It is ready to capture and share your moment. Whether you're looking to capture stunning portraits or breathtaking scenery, this device has you covered. The 2MP selfie camera lets you capture selfies.


Forget about the Charger with the Large 5100mAh Battery

The Galaxy Tab A7 Lite carries more power than you'd expect in a device this sleek. It is powered by a 5,100mAh battery that gives you the freedom to forget about the charger for long periods of time when you have somewhere to go or lots to watch. It supports 15 watts of fast charging and saves your time.

The Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Lite comes with a 01-year Official warranty (To claim please visit the nearest Samsung Service Center).
